title: Looking for a dedicated Middle Plat + season 6
body:
Hello so i have decided to main Jungle ( {{champion:104}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:77}}   ) this season and the next my goal: Diamond! =D
>>Please add me if you meet these requirements<<

>> I did my placement and for some reason was placed silver so need somone that was place around the same but with Plat experience thank<<

---Personality----
-Someone that can always see the positive
-Good to talk with
-In general just a nice person
---Communication---
-TeamSpeak3
-Skype
-Discord/Curse
Any of these will do
---Last of all---
-Someone that is 100% focused on achieving a goal of them self
-willing to improve and learn from mistakes
-Flexible
-Plat 5+ or gold 1 the lowest
Has a lot of experience already with Middle

replies.body:
Hey i am a middle laner i am in plat 2 currently finished last season plat 1 and failed diamond promos twice

IGN:AttackonOtakus
hi i main middle, i'm diamond 4 atm kappa
